name: Underground Defense
description:
This project was made for the Global Game Jam.
In Underground Defense a 2D Tower Defense inspired game playable on PC, you play as a young root that grows underground, until it becomes mature. To defend yourself, destroy insects and fungi before they reach it by clicking on it.
